name: Garden Keeper (Lo-X)
description:
Keep the garden alive! Everything is completely dry, if you water the garden enough you might see flowers bloom!

- Use the keyboard or your Xbox 360 controller to move around (other controllers might work as well).
- Use space bar or "A" (on the controller) to water the fields or fill up your watering can.
- Growing crops have little green stars flying around. Water fields that do not grow (that don't have the stars)
- If you don't water a crop in a given amount of time it will start to decay
- If you grow a crop enough it will be fully grown, earn you a star point and will not require to be watered any longer.
- Win condition is to have 130 points.
